original_title: Schools Rugby League to kick off in June 2023
original_body_lines: Sri Lanka Schools Rugby Football Association (SSRFA) conducted Under 19 Rugby League will be worked off starting from second week of June 2023 in Colombo and Kandy. There will be 14 teams playing for honors in two groups with Isipathana College playing as the defending champions.

At the conclusion of round one of six matches for each team the top two teams from each group will play across the other top two teams in the super round to decide the League winners. Text by Shamseer Jaleel
Group A - Isipathana, St. Joseph’s, Wesley, St. Thomas’, St. Anthony’s, Kingswood, D. S. Senanayake
Group B - Royal, Trinity, Vidyartha, Science, Dharmaraja, St Peter’s, Zahira,
Group A - Thurstan, Maliyadeva, Lumbini, St. Aloysius, Ananda, Piliyandala Central,
Group B - Sumangala Kandy, Prince of Wales, Mahanama, St. Benedict’s, St. Sylvester’s, Carey
Group A - St. John’s, Rahula Kandy, CWW Kanangara, Moratuwa Vidyalaya, Dharmapala, Lalith Athulathmudali,
Group B - Nalanda, Dewapathiraja, Panadura Sumangala, Siri Piyarathne, Richmond, Bandaranayake Central
